xprop.longdesc:
This beautiful and spacious home with four bedrooms and 2,400 square feet is more than enough room to enjoy a relaxing or adventurous getaway. The gorgeous view from the large balcony, with ample room to relax and sun-bathe, would make one believe they were in a dream. With two living rooms, one upstairs and one downstairs, parents can enjoy a comfortable and quiet afternoon while the children can watch their favorite movie and play adventurous games all at the same time. When those activities die down, enjoy a barbecue on the balcony with the amazing view or go fishing and maybe even catch dinner for the evening picnic. Play catch on the 75 feet of rolling sandy beach down by the water or curl up by the cozy fireplace. At night enjoy the luxury of a family bonfire and maybe swim by the light of the moon. The options and memories to be made are endless at the Calling of the Huron.

Bed Configurations: 2 Twins (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen (Bedroom 3), 1 Queen and 1 Daybed (Bedroom 4)

xprop.longdesc:
Indian Lake Retreat is located in National City on Indian lake. This 3 bedroom home will sleep up to 8 people comfortably. This home includes an awesome wrap around deck; imagine the views from this spot! Property includes a swing set for kids. You won't feel the need to be glued to the TV at all! It is for those that really want to take advantage of being on the lake, hanging out, enjoying each other's company, while taking in the scenery or enjoying water fun on this all sports lake. Room enough for everyone either upstairs or in the walk out basement. For indoor days, you may want to bring your own DVD or Gaming system, there are 2 TV's to use for this purpose. The lake is about 216 acres and has a navigable channel to Round Lake. It has largemouth bass, northern pike, panfish and is said to contain a population of refugee walleyes from the nearby Round Lake. Home is ideal for those active families so bring your boat and kayaks and have a blast with some splash!

Bed Size Configurations:
1 Full (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen (Bedroom 3), 1 Twin (Basement)

Fishing Lake information from DNR Natural Resources: https://www.michigan.gov/dnr/0,4570,7-350-79119_79146_81198_85509_85510-67574--,00.html

Welcome to a perfect vacation cottage that is a master at making memories. The AuSable River Home has 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms and the space to sleep 6 people. For adamant animal lovers, your cute ball of fur can take their much needed time off too as long as they are approved. This charming cottage is adorned by 200 feet of AuSable River front, which is perfect for fishing or to just watch ducks float by. Since you would already be relaxing outside, why not do it on the covered sun porch that faces the river? Relaxation can be found indoors as well. The house offers adequate lounging space around one of the 2 gas fireplaces. For someone looking to explore locally on their vacation, Lumberman's Monument or Iargo Springs could offer some adventure. Both have beautiful scenery and are abundant in local history. Find the softer side of life at the AuSable River Home.

Brown's Willow Beach is the perfect area for a small family reunion or a larger family vacation! With a main home and three smaller rustic cabins, a family get-together is easily accessible. Children will love the ample room to play in the grassy backyard and on a beautiful sandy beach. Lake Huron is perfect for swimming and fishing. Imagine having all your family in the same area, laughing while enjoying dinner together and reminiscing on the deck from the main home. Lots of room for everyone! Willow Beach is conveniently located in Tawas close to shopping and the biking path that runs from Alabaster Road (Tawas city area) to Tawas Point Lighthouse in East Tawas. The main home and cabins have cable and WIFI. The main home sleeps 8 (home is open all year round) and each cabin sleeps 4 (cabins are closed each year after October 15th). Cabin amenities: 1 bedroom, 1 bath, with futon, TV in living room area , New in 2017 air conditioning units, microwave, mini refrigerators (as of 2016 full size fridges removed), pots, pans, dishes and a hot plate to cook on (no stove or oven for the cabins)

Main Home Sleeps 8

Cabins Sleep 4 each

xprop.longdesc:
Charming family cottage located on Tawas Point, just a short distance around to Tawas Point State Park and one of the most incredible white sand beaches we've ever seen. View glorious sunrises or amazing sunsets just a stroll away. The interior of this 1,000+ sqaure foot gem is glowing knotty pine with family room, living room, 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath with shower and tub, full kitchen, and it sleeps 6. New for 2017 furniture for the living room, new queen bed in master bedroom, outside in the private backyard you'll enjoy a new bonfire pit and picnic table. There is also a charcoal grill. Downtown East Tawas is only 4 miles away with a paved path all the way for biking/running/walking/rollerblading. Enjoy restaurants, movies, boutique stores, ice cream, the pier, etc. The Au Sable River is only a 15-minute drive for canoeing, kayaking, tubing and fishing. If you want to bring your boat or rent one, the marina is only a few blocks away. Launch your boat for the day or rent a slip for the week. Don't forget to see the Lighthouse and check out the amazing kite boarding and world-class birding. This is the spot for relaxing and recreating! You won't want to leave!!! Available Monthly Off Season Subject to Approval.

 Bed Configurations: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Sofa Sleeper (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
This cute and cozy 750 square foot cottage located right in the town of Tawas it is the perfect spot for watching the beautiful fireworks display in July! It is also close to Tawas Gateway Park and Tawas City Park, and it is located along the scenic bike path. This 2 bedroom cottage, named for its adorable moose decorations, has a large fenced off grassy yard which is great for the kids to safely play in and there is also an area of sand in the yard which leads right out into Lake Huron. The frontage varies as the rise and fall of Lake Huron so consider it a rocky frontage, that has sand in the yard fire pit area. The kitchen which is white in color and has large sun filled windows which give a very serene feel along with the living room with its knotty pine walls very cozy. If you are looking for a comfortable yet exciting vacation spot, you've found it!

*All bed linens are included. The towels that are provided consist of 2 bath towels, 2 wash clothes, and 1 hand towel per bath. We suggest you bring personal towels.

Do you enjoy fishing? This home is right on the canal that opens up to the 1500 acres of Van Ettan Lake. The Dam sits about 70 yards away what a view! The fishing is great, especially in the summer and spring! This lake is full of Walleye, Northern Pike and many others. Bring a few buddies or your family and an approved pet to enjoy the peace on the lake. Boats are welcome and there is even a tie up to the sea wall for boats up to 20 feet. Tap water is not for drinking.  Gone fishing is located on a dead end street in a nice quiet area with minimal traffic, it is perfect for unwinding. Call us today to reserve your spot!

xprop.longdesc:
This property is so amazing! Everywhere you look there is something to see. From the rye grass fields to the bubbling stream and quaint bridges that go throughout this property.  Enjoy a nature hike on a cut and marked trail you can easily follow along the path to get right back to the home. The location alone gives you a such a sense of peace just by observing your surroundings.  This landscaped property has so much color all year from the tulips in the spring to the summer gardens, flowers in the fall and snowcapped pine trees in the winter. Just imagine blazing your own cross country trail or just walking the cut trails on this secluded 120 acre wooded property, with a stream that flows through the property winding around and ending at the Pine River and bringing you back to the fish stocked pond which also includes a glowing colored water fountain! (Pond is catch and release only). Make your way to the bon fire area located near the home in the side yard, gather around on the log benches to view the clear starlit sky’s.

This 3400 square foot home has plenty of room for everyone to spread out, it even has a game room area with shuffle board, full size pool table! Families will enjoy the ample space, this is truly a perfect home with all the comforts you would ever want.  You can sit out on the large covered porch overlooking the pond and rye fields have with your favorite beverage and watch the deer and wildlife with 120 acres of lush green forest, landscaped with rippling brooks and open ranges, this is truly a nature lovers dream.

*All bed linens are included. The towels that are provided consist of 2 bath towels, 2 wash clothes, and 1 hand towel per bath. We suggest you bring personal towels.

Bed Configurations: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Queen (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen (Bedroom 3), 1 Sofa Sleeper (Living Room)

Home has been a great spot for a small wedding (requires addtional fees and terms)

Charter services call for availability and pricing (989) 305-5945

Garage is for Owners use only

xprop.longdesc:
What an adventure! From this Michigan White Pine & Cedar home on Lake Huron, as you relax on 80 feet of Sandy beach, you can see White Stone Point to the north, Point Lookout to the south and the Charity Islands to the east. Sunrises over the lake, walks along the beach and star-lit nights are free of charge ;o) and on a clear day, you can see the historic Charity Island Lighthouse and freighter activity along the horizon! With vaulted ceilings, open floor plan, cozy screened lakeside porch and a pool table, there is room for everyone without feeling crowded. There are local boat launch areas nearby and golf courses such as Huron Breeze Golf Course & Restaurant and Knollview. The fun and R&R options are endless! Ceiling fans sway the Lake's breezes through the open windows and throughout the home. In the fall and winter, enjoy the colors, views of the icy bay, brisk beach walks, cross-country skiing and more. This beautiful home is warm, inviting and ready to welcome you.

xprop.longdesc:
Come see this dream resort! Layed out with 3 adorable, uniquely decorated, A-frame cabins on 125 feet of sugar sand beach, this resort is perfect for a family reunion (up to 18 people if you rent all 3 cabins) or a romantic getaway. Each cabin has 2 bedrooms, a high efficiency air conditioning unit, a warm and cozy gas fireplace, plenty of room for 6 to sleep, ample outdoor furniture along with a private grill and a view to take your breath away! Play football or frisbee on the beach or sunbathe on the sand with a good book. Dive into the fresh waters of Lake Huron or hike along the shoreline for miles while taking in the summer breeze. This cabin is #1 and is called the Beach House, it is the first unit you see which is next to Unit # 2. It is complete with knotty pine walls and a beach inspired theme that brings the cabin to life and creates a peaceful atmosphere for relaxing and enjoying the Up North experience!

Bed Configurations: 1 Full (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Futon (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
This wonderful cottage is a perfect place to relax and enjoy Lake Ogemaw Inland Lake. Sit on the back porch swing and watch the sunset over the lake. Bonfires and s'mores await you on a moonlit beach! Enjoy the beautiful starlit sky away from the city lights, step inside to enjoy Cable TV and check your emails on the internet. This 2 bedroom home has ample sleeping room for 6. This year round home is great for a couple, or a whole family or a guys/girl's weekend! This home has a fully equipped kitchen, you will not need to bring anything. Dogs are allowed so you can bring your four-legged friend if approved. Lake Ogemaw is an all sports lake with fishing, swimming and boating. For those looking to shop or look around, the Outlet Mall and West Branch Cinema are close by for your entertainment. Go tubing or canoeing on the nearby Rifle River. The hills of Ogemaw County are breathtaking when it come to beautiful fall colors! In the winter, ice fishing and snowmobiling are available most winters while the Ogemaw Hills Pathway provides well groomed trails for cross country skiing.

Available Monthly Off Season rates and terms are subject to approval.

Bed Configurations: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 2 Twins (Bedroom 2), 1 Full Size Futon (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
Gorgeous! Waterfront home on the west side of Cedar Lake with 75 feet of private sandy beach, a boat dock and in-ground fire pit. Large living room with 60" HDTV with DVR, vaulted ceilings and french doors that lead out to a quiet, covered deck that overlooks the scenic, all sports Cedar lake. Sit and enjoy the view rain or shine. This home has a bright open kitchen with built in dishwasher & appliances. It comes complete with an elegant dining area with vaulted ceiling, hardwood floors and a large, beautiful bay window overlooking the back yard and wooded lot. Picturesque views of the lake from the master bedroom with a private full bath. Skylights in both bathrooms, large laundry room with extra storage & second refrigerator. This home is located half mile north of Lakewood Shores Golf Course and not far from Springport Hills, White Pine, Red Hawk and several others golf courses. Cedar Lake has swimming, canoeing, kayaking, boating and fishing and is close to the AuSable River, VanEtten Lake, Lake Huron and Huron National Forest, along with several state parks for summer and winter sports. You can launch your boat at the cement boat launch at the Public Park located inside of Lakewood Shores. For those that want to enjoy shopping, great dining or other activities, come visit the City of Oscoda, Harrisville and or Tawas.

This is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath ranch home with 100 feet of Lake Huron frontage in Black River Michigan. This home is 1500 square feet with central air, surrounded by quiet serenity. There are 2 living rooms, a recently remodeled kitchen with gorgeous views of the lake. Black River is located 25 minutes south of Alpena and 35 minutes north of Oscoda. Harrisville is a small, quaint town within a 10 minute drive; it features attractions such as the Sturgeon Point Light House and Cedar brook Trout Farm for kids (Located 5 minutes south of the property) are Ice Cream shops, yum! For the Nature lovers 4-5 miles from the home there are miles of Trailhead (Alcona ORV Trail (29.3 miles) & Bull Gap Trail (100 miles) located between Oscoda and Black River as well as two State Forest Camp Grounds (Harrisville & Negwegon State Park that has walking trails 2-3 miles of undeveloped beach). The Alcona Trail is only 40 minutes away. Also located 3 miles north is a boat launch on the Black River that feeds into Lake Huron and is great for Fishing. Pet friendly (dog only).

xprop.longdesc:
This beautifully appointed, upscale home is located on scenic Van Etten Lake in Oscoda, Michigan. This home is one of two homes on Van Etten Lake which is a year round, all-sports lake perfect for fishing, boating, waterskiing, canoeing, jet skiing, ice fishing, snowmobiling, kayaking, etc. You can tie your boat up on owners private dock while you clean your catch of the day at the fish cleaning station, which could be walleye, northern pike, bass, perch or any of the other various pan fish in the lake. Relax dockside in your comfortable Adirondack chair while watching the colorful sunsets atop the lake and roasting your marshmallows, s'mores or hot dogs over your modern fire pit.  End your day of dreams with a swim in the crystal clear waters of sandy bottomed Van Etten Lake. The upscale home is a fully furnished and includes a Culligan reverse osmosis water purification system, central air and Wi Fi  all of the amenities you would need to make your visit both comfortable as well as memorable. Two fully furnished bedrooms provide magnificent, sleeping areas with new queen size beds new linens and new Berber carpets. If you need a little more space, the fully furnished living room includes the comforts of a queen size pull out bed. Cook your fresh fish in the fully appointed kitchen with the added amenities of an omelet maker, waffle maker and bread maker. Each room has a ceiling fan for your comfort. Property is near Lumberman's Monument, scenic Au Sable River, the shores of Lake Huron, as well as canoe rentals. Also nearby are grocery stores, pharmacies and restaurants. Free concerts in downtown Oscoda, playground equipment, as well as ice cream parlors to complete your dream vacation at Socrates Place on beautiful Van Etten Lake. Owner occupies the front home,  but this home has its own entrance and walk way to the lake. If you're fortunate enough the homeowner may be around and inclined to take you on an exploration of Van Etten lake on their pontoon.  Homeowner is known to provide guests with firewood and fishing equipment if asked. You are sure enjoy the personal touches of this vacation rental home. 

 

Bed Configuration: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Queen (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen Sleeper Sofa (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
This 5 bedroom 3.5 bath Residential Log Home sleeps 14 includes a Sauna for up to 6 and Large Jacuzzi tub! This home is located close to Silver Creek and Corsair Ski Trails in the heart of Huron's National Forest this place would be awesome to bring your horses or snowmobiles to ride the trails nearby. It is a very secluded retreat with 15 acres of land that is surrounded by Huron National Forest; it's the perfect opportunity to connect with family and friends. Check out the loft area great for playing cards or use the downstairs Poker table!  Home has TV local channels only but you won’t need any more than that, enjoy the time reading a book, playing cards, or going to the nearby trails you will never be crowed in this 3200 square foot home room for everyone comfortably! The kitchen is built for those who love to cook! Huge Refrigerator and warming drawer along with a spare 2nd refrigerator you can bring all the food you'd love to cook. There are many outdoor activities if you chose to partake in from nature walks (take your GPS remember you are surrounded by Huron National Forest) to fishing in the catch and release pond, or watch for Coyotes, fox or Squirrels, Deer or perhaps you may even see a Bear! Although there is no hunting allowed on this property you can hunt on Federal Land nearby. There is even a shooting range for those that have a legal permit to carry, you can sight in a gun or perhaps target shooting, there is also a horseshoe pit and an outdoor fire pit with a screen top to keep the embers at a minimum. Truly a spacious private rental! Rest assured there's plenty of mother nature to take in when you visit away from it all!

*Cell service may be limited in this area please check with your local carrier if cell phone is required

*All bed linens are included. The towels that are provided consist of 2 bath towels, 2 wash clothes, and 1 hand towel per bath. We suggest you bring personal towels.

Limited Parking: 5 cars max

xprop.longdesc:
Location and room for everyone is what this home is about! This vastly unique, beautiful property location on Lake Huron out near Tawas Point has a main home, 3 individual cabins all on a private 100 x 500 foot treed lot. The Main Home and Cabin 1 are up front closest to the water while the other 2 cabins are located behind the main home. Talk about a great place for kids to play with such a nice large yard or venture out into the water (adult supervision of course) those waves can be strong,  just take few stairs down off of the large deck. The main home has 3 bedrooms and has an air unit, and 1 bath with spacious living room and a nice size deck. There is Cable TV and internet provided in the main house but not the cabins. You can all gather during the day around cabin 1 which includes a kitchen and 1/2 bath all in a rustic and timeless log cabin. Perfect for BBQ and family get-together with its large enclosed sun porch and bar area that overlooks Lake Huron. You will not miss TV in the cabins since you are able to enjoy star gazing or sunrises right from either the outdoor patio or enclosed sunroom. Just before the main home is a yellow charming rustic 2 bedroom 1 bath cabin with 2 single beds and 1 full bed. Also there is a living room, dining area and full kitchen. Last is the first red rustic cabin right off the main road which is a 2 bedroom 1 bath comfortable and roomy lodging with a double bunk bed and full size bed. This cottage also has a living room, dining room and kitchen. This Great Escape gives up to 20 guests plenty of room for outdoor activities offering the ability to enjoy time together yet still have some privacy by retreating to your own cabin. This place will definitely become a favorite of yours!  Baldwin Resort Road is near the bike path going out to Tawas Point Lighthouse.

*There is Cable TV and internet provided in the main house but not the cabins

*Please keep in mind when properties have seawalls like this one,  they do not have railings so as always any time you are near the waters edge you will want to be mindful.  The yard provides ample space for children to play however you will always have to supervise children near any body of water.

Limited Parking: 8 cars max

Garage is for Owners use only

This 3 bedroom, 2 bath house is bright with newer amenities after a recent remodel. Vacation with ease in a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, living room, laundry, outdoor dining, and a cool recreation room just to hang out in during the day or at night. This cottage offers many amenities including fire pit, wooden swing, charcoal grill, outdoor shower to wash off some of the sand, and the recreation room with games and several VHS movies. Pick a good book from the selection of novels and relax on the beach or in the cozy, grassy, fenced in backyard. The house is located just minutes away from restaurants, grocery shopping, antiques, canoeing, golf courses, and more! Two blocks to the public beach for an extensive playground, pavillion, and free weekly concerts. The waterfront has shallow, crystal clear water which is great for young swimmers and water games. Just past the sand bar is deeper water for watercraft. Don't forget you have access to the nearby Oscoda Beach Park and the easement beach.

Limited Parking: 2 cars max

NEW OWNERS for 2018 with new updates inside and out, same Faith House charm. Faith House is a beautifully furnished 2-bedroom cottage located just 5 blocks from the heart of beautiful downtown East Tawas and only a few minutes drive to one of several city and State park beaches located on Lake Huron's Tawas Bay. Immediately next door to Faith House is a paved pathway that circles a pair of ballfields and leads to a city pavilion, playground, library, and basketball courts. After a day of activities, come back to Faith House to unwind around a campfire, read a book on the front porch, or watch your favorite movie or show on the Roku-equipped TV or one of the many DVDs on the shelf. WiFi internet available for phones, tablets, and computers! Whatever you’re looking for, Faith House is the perfect place to set up base camp or, better yet, to simply do nothing at all. xprop.longdesc:
New Property this year, more summer photos to come! Cute family friendly property on 73 feet of frontage on Stylus Lake! Home sleeps 6 and is about 1040 square feet which is a perfect size for a smaller group. It is located in Ogemaw county just 18 miles from West Branch where you will find the Tanger outlet mall, only 10 miles to the quaint town of Hale, and 20 miles to Tawas area for Lake Huron Beaches! Come unwind in the enclosed sunroom or out on the larger deck area. Look out towards the island just off shore where you typically see water birds. Bring your kayak, canoe or boat for a paddle around the all sports lake. Serenity can be found, just viewing the beautiful sunsets overlooking the lake. If you  bring a boat the boat access is located down the road in a mostly grassy area. Stylus lake is known for largemouth bass, northern pike, bluegills and a chance for walleyes! Lake is 179 acres with a max depth of 30 feet. You will have use of the one car attached garage. It is a new property this year, so pictures were taken in late fall, so outdoor furniture was put away we will update photos this summer 2018.

xprop.longdesc:
New property! Finn's Landing is located on Lake Huron and is only 1/2 mile from Tawas Point State Park. So many things to enjoy! Come and play in the water or hike over to the park to enjoy miles of the most beautiful beaches! For quiet time, enjoy a camp fire with smores and smiles. All while enjoying the waves rhythmically lap against the break wall. Awake to the sun rising over the endless lake or enjoy the reflection off the water like millions of diamonds, so sparkling! You will not miss local TV, you will have a Roku device on TV to access a wide variety of content. This enables you to use your own streaming subscriptions for watching movies and tv shows, listening to music, and even playing a game or two.

 

This is owner's dream come true. The home was sold over 20 years ago, they now have it back after they thought it was long gone. If you have heard the song "the house that built me", this is that house! They find immense joy offering this home to you to share a true blessing. This cherished home is sure to provide you the inspiration, adventure, and tranquility it gave owners growing up. Tawas Point is a such a special place in a quaint neighborhood. They hope you enjoy it as much as they have. There are plenty of your own memories to be made at Finn's Landing.

*Please keep in mind when properties have seawalls they do not have railings. So any time you are near the water's edge you will want to be mindful and supervise children near any body of water. Waves are strong, when wind is present, for walk in gradual depth sandy beach front for small children you may want to go to the State Park it has a great play area for children. If you walk in it is free if you drive it is $16.00 annually for all Michigan State parks.


Limited Parking: 3 Cars Max

Bedroom Configuration: Bedroom 1 (Queen Bed) Bedroom 2 (Full Bed) Livingroom Futon (Full Size)

xprop.longdesc:
The Bay House is a 1900's vintage beach home, recently remodeled and across the street from the public beach in East Tawas, MI. This quaint cottage has beautiful views of all the summer entertainment right from the comfort of the front deck and sun porch. No matter what the weather, you'll enjoy your own relaxing spot to kick back and unwind. It's just a short 5-minute walk up to the downtown area with lots of places to explore and local dining options. Across the street are the local park with public beach access and a pier.

The cottage is clean and modern on the inside with its beach house vibe. You’ll love the clean white walls, gleaming wood floors, and marine blue decorating theme of this sweet cozy home. The living room has a cable-connected TV so you can lay back and enjoy your favorite movies and shows. There is also free Wi-Fi. The 1200 sq. ft. home has two bedrooms, one bath, and a separate dining room. It sleeps seven and is a great fit for families. However, parking is limited to four cars maximum.

The fully furnished kitchen includes a refrigerator, stove/oven, microwave, toaster, coffeemaker, dishes, glasses, utensils, cookware, and cooking utensils. The dining room table seats four, with two more at bistro table. Or enjoy eating breakfast or dinner out on the sun porch's patio table for four, or the deck's bistro table. There are lots of places to spread out and enjoy a favorite home-cooked meal, or make one table your game table! You can even grill out on the charcoal grill and serve up your vacation favorites.

Sleeping Arrangements: Bedroom 1 - Queen Bed; Bedroom 2 - Full Bed & Futon; Queen Sofa Sleeper in living room.

xprop.longdesc:
A Slice of Heaven is just that! Recently added to the rental inventory; home is located on 125 ft of Lake Huron sandy beach. To start off you enter the blacktop drive that has a nice, large yard area both in front and in back. Once inside, you can feel the serenity kicking in. Starting with a knotty pine interior followed by an open floor plan. As soon as you enter the living room/dining room area you can see a spectacular view. Includes awesome amenities like central air, Wi-Fi, and a lot of room to spread out inside and outside. Main bathroom has a jetted tub, while the second bathroom has a shower. The laundry room has a spare refrigerator for your use. The bunk house, located near the back-deck area, is so quaint and has just enough room to be comfortable for a good night’s rest. Also has a shower area and air unit inside, even your own little porch. The kids can play right out in front there is a larger hill, how fun! Steps are on the side leading to the beach area. Boat launch isn’t far away if you want to bring along your jet skis or small boats to tie up to the dock. Book today to enjoy; your own little slice of heaven awaits!

Limited Parking: Cars Max 4

It's all about BEACH! This 2 bedroom, one bath cottage offers breathtaking sunrises over Lake Huron. You can enjoy 66 feet of private, sandy beach year round. The gas fireplace offers a cozy way to take off the morning chill. This family home is a budget friendly way to relax and unwind. Connect with family and friends on the beach, in the lake or at any of the many landmarks the Oscoda/Greenbush area has to offer from Lumberman's Monument and Iargo Spring to the notorious Champagne Hill. If you're looking for a private getaway...you've found the place!
